births.name: Sickly
births.description: You were born frail and weak, prone to illness. Though you survived, your body never quite caught up.

births.name: Healthy
births.description: You were born strong and vigorous, a healthy child who thrived from the start.

births.name: Runt
births.description: You were the smallest of your siblings or peers, forcing you to rely on cunning rather than strength.

births.name: Robust
births.description: You were born large and sturdy, your constitution stronger than most from birth.

births.name: Twin
births.description: You shared the womb with a sibling. You learned cooperation and reading others from your earliest moments.

births.name: Born Under the Blood Moon
births.description: You entered the world during a blood moon, an omen of dark power. Magic flows through you unnaturally.

births.name: Storm Child
births.description: Born during a violent tempest, you carry the storm's fury within you. Adversity barely fazes you.

births.name: Winter Born
births.description: You arrived in the depths of winter, your first breath cold air. You adapted to hardship early.

births.name: Summer Blessed
births.description: Born on the longest day of summer, warmth and vitality mark your existence.

births.name: Omen Child
births.description: Your birth was accompanied by strange signs—prophets and seers took note. You were touched by fate.

births.name: Marked
births.description: You bear an unusual birthmark or feature that sets you apart. Some see it as a blessing, others a curse.

births.name: Stillborn (Returned)
births.description: You were born without breath, declared dead—but somehow returned to life. Death feels familiar.

births.name: Noble Birth
births.description: You were born into privilege and status, your bloodline carrying weight and expectation.

births.name: Commoner Birth
births.description: Born to common folk, you learned early that nothing comes easy and work builds character.

births.name: Orphaned at Birth
births.description: Your parents died in childbirth or shortly after. You've never known family.

births.name: Blessed by Clergy
births.description: Religious figures attended your birth, blessing you in the name of their deity.

births.name: Cursed Birth
births.description: Something went wrong at your birth—a curse, a hex, or dark magic. You've carried it ever since.

births.name: Breech Birth
births.description: You came into the world backwards, a difficult and dangerous delivery. You survived against the odds.

births.name: Born Abroad
births.description: Your birth occurred far from your ancestral homeland, in a foreign land. You've always been between worlds.

births.name: Prodigy
births.description: From birth, you showed signs of exceptional intelligence or talent beyond your years.

births.name: Feral Birth
births.description: You were born in the wild, away from civilization. Nature was your first teacher.

births.name: Touched by Fey
births.description: Fey creatures were present at your birth, leaving their otherworldly mark upon you.

births.name: Born in Battle
births.description: You were born on a battlefield or during a siege. War was the first sound you heard.

births.name: Miracle Child
births.description: Your birth was deemed impossible—your mother was barren, dying, or cursed. Yet here you are.

births.name: Seventh Son/Daughter
births.description: You are the seventh child of a seventh child, a numerologically significant birth bringing mystical potential.
